project.name: GeoMesa Accumulo Spark Runtime, Accumulo 2.x
project.dependencies:

org.locationtech.geomesa geomesa-tools_${scala.binary.version} runtime
org.locationtech.geomesa geomesa-jupyter-leaflet_${scala.binary.version} runtime
org.apache.accumulo accumulo-core compile
